content: the very last st turn 3 * chain 1 make a treble_crochet double_crochet in the first st treble_crochet double_crochet in the chain 1 space in the centre treble_crochet double_crochet make the following 2 treble_crochet double_crochet chain 2 2 treble_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet double_crochet in the chain 1 space treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st chain 1 double_crochet single_crochet in the double_crochet single_crochet below * repeat from * to * 14 more times ending with a double_crochet single_crochet in the last st fasten_off and sew in ends i would highly recommend blocking this scarf to stop the edges from curling and to open up the design my scarf measured approx 77 inches by 18 inches i really hope you enjoy making this scarf suzy x
